response.answer_text: Physically, I think so. However, being an Alpha is all about willpower. Toothless had huge amounts of willpower, particularly when he burst out of that ice in HTTYD2. The Bewilderbeasts had the willpower to enslave dragons, as it were, to bend the minds of other dragons to their will. I don’t know the physics behind Toothless’ ‘Alpha Mode’ or if it was explained in The Hidden World, but I do know that a lot of what he did was due to his owerwhelming wish to protect Hiccup. If another dragon could find that motivation, I’m pretty sure they’d be able to some pretty special things as well. Particularly Titanwings, which are physically much more powerful and have special features. I do think that it comes much more naturally to species like the Bewilderbeasts, Red Deaths, and Foreverwings, though, since they all seem to be able to control others.

It really depends on the situation. If it is like a small pack of dragons, then common dragons like Deadly Nadders, Monstrous Nightmares can be the ‘Alpha’ or ‘Leader’. But if we’re talking about the King of Dragons, than its usually species like Bewilderbeasts and Night Furies. The Alpha or King of Dragons usually has special abilities. EXAMPLES:  The photo above shows Toothless’ ability to camouflage. This photo is actually a better example of ‘Titan’ mode or ‘Alpha’ mode.  My theory is that Night Furies are the ‘true’ King of Dragons due to the fact that even Drago’s Bewilderbeast bowed down in respect to Toothless and his Queen.

No. I wouldn’t say so. Can any species? Probably. I think it depends on the will and strength of the individual dragon. Toothless had what it takes and even though he was most likely the smallest alpha of all, he had to be the best ever. He had all the qualities of a great leader. Loyalty, compassion, determination, and stubborn will. He couldn’t be controlled because those he loved were more and important to him than obeying the whims of a mad man. And that’s what makes a leader, being able to resist and stand against opposition and protect his own. That’s what makes an alpha.

According to the makers of Httyd series, there are only two species capable of being an Alpha- Bewilderbeast and Night Furies. And the title Alpha refers to the King of Dragons. Of course there can be queens of the nest who are mostly of the same species but Titan wing. The exception to this was the Red Death which used Some sort of homing signals to partially control the other dragons.
